listitem.para: This argument can be either a jimage object containning image's matrix and meta data, or a hypermatrix of one, three or four layers representing a gray-scale, RGB or RGBA image. Image must be a int8,16,32 or uint8,16,32 matrix, a boolean matrix or a real matrix.
Negative of image. Nagative get the same type than image

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function invert the colors of an image.

For each pixels, the new color is calculated with the formula : "NewColor = 255 - OriginalColor".
Trancparency layer of an RGBA hypermatrix is not modified by jimnegative.
